channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ Season 2 Spoilers Fly With New Set Leaks
item.description: Daredevil Born Again season 2 is filming, and there is no avoiding spoilers at this point given its central location.

item.title: These Hackers Use Your GPU To Load Password-Stealing Malware
item.description: Just when you thought infostealer attacks couldn’t get any more dangerous, hackers are now executing code using the GPU to evade detection and steal y...

item.title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max Prices Slashed Further In New Deals
item.description: Amazon’s Big Spring Deal is in full swing and it includes some further, deeper discounts on refurbished iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max handsets.

item.title: How A Fitness Tracker Can Help People With Diabetes
item.description: A newly published study looks into the impact of a fitness tracker watch on the early treatment of those recently diagnosed with diabetes.

item.title: Microsoft’s Copilot Agents Transform Executive Decision-Making
item.description: Microsoft Copilot’s Researcher and Analyst agents represent a significant leap toward AI-augmented leadership.

item.title: Obvious vs perhaps
item.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.

item.title: The name doesn’t matter (that much)
item.description: Busy people in important organizations waste a lot of time naming things. It could be that once a name is good enough, you’re done. That’s certainly t...

item.title: The NSE confusions
item.description: “Nobody wants this” is unlikely. “Somebody will like this” is almost certainly true. “Everyone needs this” is a trap. The work begins with finding the...

item.title: Project ownership (equity and equity)
item.description: Since the days of Atari and Apple, the culture of Silicon Valley has been based on the idea of programmers and early employees owning equity in the st...

item.title: The second time through
item.description: One way to understand creative work is to think about the time and effort required to do something the first time versus doing it again. A novel might...
